text: The god of this age has blinded the minds of unbelievers like them, so that 4:4 the light of the gospel of the glory of Christ, who is the image of God, might not dawn upon them Â¦ they might not see the light of the gospel of the glory of Christ, who is the image of God CTthe light of the gospel of the glory of Christ, who is the image of God, might not dawn upon them.
